short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Front end for the Phoxtrot app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Pokemon-style game that runs in the browser. Every time the player visits a new URL, they have a chance of encountering an internet monster called a Phox. Players can collect, train, and battle with their Phoxes as they hop from web page to web page. Currently in Alpha testing.
